price: 45. Mpe Mûssa abwaki lingenda lia ye, mpe tala emeli nyoso oyo basalaki.
arabic: فَأَلۡقَىٰ مُوسَىٰ عَصَاهُ فَإِذَا هِيَ تَلۡقَفُ مَا يَأۡفِكُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: fa-alqā mūsā ʿaṣāhu fa-idhā hiya talqafu mā yafikūna
